summary: An infinite soul gem used to recharge weapons
descriptionHtml:
A soul gem that never will run out (or at lease it shouldn\'t)
 Location: The river wood trader top floor, on top of the drawer between the beds

~ installation ~ 
1.download file
2.open the zip file
3.take out the file labeled  \"itemrecharger\" and put it in the :C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data folder
4.then play

if you have any questions please pm or email me.
author: Dajaon
